io.vertx.ext.web.handler

Interface JWTAuthHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AuthHandler, Handler<RoutingContext>

    public interface JWTAuthHandler
extends AuthHandler
    An auth handler that provides JWT Authentication support.
    Author:
    Paulo Lopes
